content: special edition sunflower granny square blanket pattern *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/specialeditionsunflowerblanket this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy just in time for fall this special edition sunflower blanket is a nod to the original autumn sunflower pillow and blanket patterns made with super chunky yarn it works up really quickly happy making everyone this pattern is worked up using a starburst sunflower granny square the pattern uses wool ease thick and quick and a 9 00mm hook the final blanket size is 47 x 72 blocked pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours/colour legend - yarn recommendations/links - stitch glossary - printable pdf - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copy - full written instruction for the granny square used starburst sunflower - video tutorials for the granny square continuous join as you go cjayg method of joining happy crocheting everyone l m
